caption.p: ( a) Chronopotentiometric curves of the AACVD V 2O 5 coating (2 cm × 2 cm × 0.3 cm) at 500 °C at a specific current of 5.9 A g −1 for the 1st and the 2000th scan. ( b) Rate capability of the same sample at specific current values ranging from 5.9 to 2.4 A g −1 and then back to 5.9 A g −1 [ 73].
